com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream

Interface HttpDataSource.Factory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSource.Factory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpDataSourceFactory, HttpDataSource.BaseFactory
    Enclosing interface:
    HttpDataSource

    public static interface HttpDataSource.Factory
extends DataSource.Factory
    A factory for HttpDataSource instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllDefaultRequestProperties()
      Clears all default request header fields for all HttpDataSource instances subsequently created by the factory.
      void clearDefaultRequestProperty(String name)
      Clears a default request header field for HttpDataSource instances subsequently created by the factory.
      HttpDataSource createDataSource()
      Creates a DataSource instance.
      void setDefaultRequestProperty(String name, String value)
      Sets a default request header field for HttpDataSource instances subsequently created by the factory.

    • Method Detail

      • createDataSource

        HttpDataSource createDataSource()
        Description copied from interface: DataSource.Factory
        Creates a DataSource instance.
        Specified by:
        createDataSource in interface DataSource.Factory

      • setDefaultRequestProperty

        void setDefaultRequestProperty(String name,
                               String value)
        Sets a default request header field for HttpDataSource instances subsequently created by the factory. Previously created instances are not affected.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the header field.
        value - The value of the field.

      • clearDefaultRequestProperty

        void clearDefaultRequestProperty(String name)
        Clears a default request header field for HttpDataSource instances subsequently created by the factory. Previously created instances are not affected.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the header field.

      • clearAllDefaultRequestProperties

        void clearAllDefaultRequestProperties()
        Clears all default request header fields for all HttpDataSource instances subsequently created by the factory. Previously created instances are not affected.
